message:
There are more than **2 commits in a row failing** on {{[@git.branch].name}} for pipeline {{[@ci.pipeline.name].name}}.

_What to do next:_

1. Navigate to the [BuildKite - main builds](https://buildkite.com/handshake/handshake/builds?branch=main)
2. Inspect the recent failures and see if they are related.
3. Is there a flaky test? [Review Handling Flakey Specs and take the appropriate action](https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/755138564/Handling+Flakey+Specs)
4. Did a recent PR cause the failures? Reach out to the author and ask them for support.
